import React from 'react' import { useState, useEffect, useContext } from "react" import axios from "axios" import AmountPaid from '../Medical/AmountPaid' import { URL } from '../../index' import '../../../node_modules/bootstrap/js/dist/dropdown' import {UpdateAppointment} from './UpdateAppointment' import '../../css/appointment.css' import '../../css/bootstrap.css' const AllAppointmentslist = (props) => { const url = useContext(URL) const [appointmentform, setappointmentform] = useState("none"); const [d_form, setd_form] = useState() const toggleappointmentform = () => { if (appointmentform === "none") { setappointmentform("block"); setd_form(true) } if (appointmentform === "block") { setappointmentform("none"); setd_form() } }; const [getAppointments, setgetAppointments] = useState([]) const [isLoading, setisLoading] = useState() async function fetchallAppointmentslist() { setisLoading(true) await axios.get(`${url}/appointment/list`).then((response) => { setgetAppointments(response.data.data) console.log(response.data.data) }) setisLoading(false) } useEffect(() => { fetchallAppointmentslist() }, []) return ( <> { isLoading == true ?
